name: Ghoul Grub
description:
Ghoul Grub is an arcade-y monster cooking game where you cook as many meals as possible as quickly as possible to maximize your score and restaurant rating. The better you do the harder it becomes.

If you're curious about the controls before playing, they're right here (controls can also be viewed from within the game):

Controls Keys Move WASD/Arrow Keys Interact F Move Items Drag and Drop

This game was developed for a games class at the University of Utah by Ryan Mileris, Ben Rose, Rebekka Staggs, Sage Young and 1 other.
